name: Barezi Morales
bio: Hi there! My name is Barezi Morales and I am a software engineer with a strong desire to use my skills and knowledge to push humanity forward in a positive direction. My passion for software development was ignited during the pandemic, when I decided to make a change in my life and pursue a career in computer science. Over the past year, I have dedicated myself to personal and professional growth, constantly learning and improving my programming skills through self-study and schooling.As a software engineer, I am driven by the satisfaction of solving complex problems and helping others do the same. I bring a curious, exploratory mindset and strong problem-solving skills to my work, and I am excited to use these attributes to make a meaningful contribution to the world through my career. I believe that, with the right mindset and determination, we can all work together to progress humanity in the right direction
